pages.text: This section will discuss and show the important information needed for your travels. Things can include biome, dimension, and $(k)weapons$(). So use these for a quick reminder. $(br2)SO HEED MY WARNINGS! Everything here could mean the difference between life and death! Well sort of...

As you grow stronger, you will begin to ask more questions. $(br2)But know this wanderer, the further you fly to the light the more blinded you'll become... Take the time you need to understand what's at stake. $(br2)Absorb the knowledge you've gained and find the $(k)truth$(). Don't rush the experience like $(k)us$() Or should I say $(k)us from a long time ago.$()
